# Longitudinal data analysis 

## Tools for longitudinal data analysis 

  - [lme4](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/lme4/index.html) R package - fits all your basic linear mixed models 
  
  - [nlme](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/nlme/index.html) R package - offers functionality for nonlinear mixed effect models
